segments.text: I notice the girl standing near the boy, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so patient and hopeful, it's really sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she knows how dangerous it is for her brother to be standing on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should tell her to be careful, but I don't want to scare her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way she's looking at the cookie jar is just adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she gets a cookie before they get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water on the floor getting closer to her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm scared she might slip and fall, but she seems steady on her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's really brave to be standing so close to the action.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at her excitement and anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they both enjoy their cookies, but safely.
segments.speaker: PAR
